abstract.t: Work has started in the ITU, the IETF IP over Optical Working Group,and in the OIF to specify the requirements for ASON NNI routing.One of the requirements identified is support for multi-levelhierarchies.IS-IS is one of the candidate protocols to provide thisfunctionality. Therefore, methods for multi-level IS-IS routingneed to be developed.This draft documents one that provides multi-level routing throughthe 'stacking' of Level 2 IS-IS instances. The method is possibleusing existing extensions to IS-IS. It also provides insight intosome of the resulting operational issues.
